name: Net Maneuvering
text: With sweeping movements and brute force, you can use your net to put foes at a disadvantage.
prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, base attack bonus +3.
benefit: In melee, you can use a net to trip or disarm opponents instead of entangling them. You gain a +2 bonus on disarm checks made to use a net in this way. Further, if you have an opponent entangled in your net, you can attempt to drag or reposition that opponent as long as he is within your net’s reach or you control the trailing rope on your net.
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, you can also use a net to drag or reposition an opponent.
text_zh: 靠着技巧和蛮力，你可以将敌人玩弄在你的网中。
prerequisites_zh: 擅长异种武器（网），捕网熟练，BAB+3。
benefit_zh: 在战斗中，你可以使用网进行绊摔或卸武、而非纠缠你的敌人。当你这么使用网进行卸武时，你的战技检定有+2加值。此外，如果敌人正被你的网纠缠，你可以尝试对其进行拖拽或移位战技检定，距离最多为你的网的触及范围或你用纤绳能控制网的距离。
staminaText_zh: 只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能使用捕网进行拖拽和移位战技。
